mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (user_id, email, password, oauth2_id, name, nickname, phone, provider, enabled, role_id) values (0, #{email}, #{password}, null, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{provider}, #{enabled}, #{roleId})

insert into user_tb (user_id, email, password, oauth2_id, name, nickname, phone, provider, enabled, role_id) values (0, #{email}, null, #{oauth2Id}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{provider}, #{enabled}, #{roleId})
mapper.select: select user_id, email, password, oauth2_id, name, nickname, phone, provider, enabled, role_id from user_tb where email = #{email}
select user_id, email, password, oauth2_id, name, nickname, phone, provider, enabled, role_id from user_tb where oauth2_id = #{oauth2Id}
select (select if(count(*) > 0, 1, 0) from user_tb where email = #{email}) + (select if(count(*) > 0, 2, 0) from user_tb where nickname = #{nickname}) as result
